Teaching person isn't about presenting something to be memorized. To support overall people, this page will provide games and texts designed to encourage people to explore and discover the world around them.

Although in school we are introduced to subjects called Science or Mathematics before entering university, teaching often limits itself to presenting only the initial stages of this field. These stages could be referred to as proto-Mathematics or pre-Mathematics, as proposed by Dr. Francisco González A. Redondo (González Redondo, Francisco A., ; González Redondo, Francisco A., ; González Redondo, Francisco A., ; History Tracers Team, The knowledge). In the texts of this section, we present the concepts of pre-Mathematics and proto-Mathematics, gradually connecting them to Mathematics.

Volume 1 – The Foundations of the Universe: In this volume, we study, through different cultures, how we discovered the numbers we use in our daily lives and explore their use in different stages of our life.

Volume 2 – Within Our Reach: In this volume, we study and deepen our knowledge about numbers, expanding our perspective into the heart of different cultures.
